皁字的基本解释

皁
zào
同“皂”。

皁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zào］
“草2”的今字。“早2”的被通假字。同“皂1”。

皁字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【白字部】　皁； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页786第02
【唐韻】昨早切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】在早切，?曹上聲。【博雅】皁隸，臣也。【類篇】賤人也。【左傳·昭七年】士臣皁，皁臣輿，輿臣隸。【疏】服䖍云：皁，造也。造，成事也。　又【博雅】櫪也。【集韻】馬閑。【周禮·夏官·校人】三乘爲皁，皁一趣馬。【註】馬十二匹爲皁，一皁之馬，趣馬一人主之。【史記·鄒陽傳】牛馬同皁。【註】韋昭曰：皁，養馬之官。郭璞云：養馬之器。【漢書·音義】食牛馬器，以木作如槽。【揚子·方言】梁宋齊楚北燕之閒謂櫪曰皁。　又【玉篇】色黑也。【博雅】緇謂之皁。【廣韻】黑繒也。【史記·秦本紀】錫爾皁游。【前漢·賈誼傳】自衣皁綈。【后漢禮儀志】日冬至，召太史，令各板書，封以皁囊。【漢官儀】凡章表皆啓封，其言密事得皁囊也。　又皁白，猶黑白也。【北史·魏臨淮王傳】中山皁白太多，未若濟南風流寬雅。　又鳥名。【唐陸璣毛詩鳥獸疏】鸛雀，一名皁裙。　又【釋名】早也。日未出時早起，視物皆黑，此色如之也。【周禮·地官·大司徒】山林其植物宜皁物。【註】皁，柞栗之屬

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zào］
The present word for "草2". "As early as 2" was passed falsely. Same as "Soap 1".
soap

【Lunch Concentration】【Bai Zi Department】　Zao; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 786 No. 02
[Tang Yun] cut yesterday morning [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] cut early,? Cao Shangsheng. [Bo Ya] Zaoli, the minister. 【Classes】Bitch too. [Zuo Zhuan·Seventh Year of Zhao] Shichenzao, Zaochenyu, Yuchenli. [Sparse] Fu Chuyun: Soap, make also. It's done.　[Bo Ya] Toya. [Ji Yun] Ma Xian. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Schoolman】The three vehicles are soap, and the horse is fun. [Note] Twelve horses are soap, a horse is a soap, and a fun horse is owned by one person. [Historical Records · Zou Yang Biography] Niu and horses are with soap. [Note] Wei Zhao said: Soap, the official of horse breeding. Guo Puyun: A tool for raising horses. 【Han Shu·Sound and Meaning】Eater of cattle and horses, made of wood like a trough. [Yangtze Dialect] Liang Song Qi, Chu Beiyan's leisure is called Tochiyue soap.　[Jade articles] The color is also black. [Liberal Arts] So that is the soap. [Guang Yun] Hei 缯 also. [Historical Records·Qin Benji] Xierzao Tour. [Previous Han·Jia Yi Biography] Self-clothing. [Later Han Dynasty Etiquette] On the winter solstice, call Taishi, order all blackboards, and seal them with soap sacs. [Han Guan Yi] All chapters and tables are unsealed, and their secrets are also a sap sac.　It's so white, it's black and white. [Beishi·Wei Linhuai Wang Biography] Zhongshan is too white, not as elegant as Jinan.　Also known as the bird name. [Tang Luji Mao's poems on birds and beasts] Crane, a soap skirt.　[Release name] It’s too early. Get up early when the day is not out, and everything is dark, this color is just like it is. 【Zhou Li·Di Guan·Da Situ】Mountains and forests are suitable for soap. [Note] Soap, a genus of Tussah
